title: Game Progress Route
content:

If you attempt the History check, you will need to pass a DC of 16. Then you will remember a chant that is used to void a devil's contract. You will now get the next choices:

'Abi diabole, et nunquam redi.' [HISTORY] Remember all you can about devils and their contracts. [PERFORMANCE] Say you know a pact-breaking charm and chant a series of pseudo-Infernal phrases. Poor
